title: A Perilous Crossing to Greece
body: Boats and life jackets left by migrants on a Lesbos beach. “Coming in the winter like this is unprecedented,” said Alessandra Morelli, the director of emergency operations in Greece for the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees.
summary: Boats and life jackets left by migrants on a Lesbos beach.“Coming in the winter like this is unprecedented,” said Alessandra Morelli, the director of emergency operations in Greece for the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees.
